title: Breakdown of the Department of Homeland Security budget by organization 2020
yAxis: Budget authority in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.
The Budget authority in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and lowest at Organisation Office of Inspector General.
Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has 168.69 times more Budget authority in million U.S. dollars than Organisation Office of Inspector General which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Organisation in the x axis and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.
The second highest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Organisation U.S. Customs and Border Protection.
There is a difference of 28538.63 between the maximum Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and minimum Organisation Office of Inspector General.

The Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has the highest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars, followed by U.S. Customs and Border Protection, and U.S. Coast Guard. Down to the Organisation Office of Inspector General which is the lowest.
The Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency tends to be 4.37 percent higher than average.
